mapper.select:
select ac.id, ac.title, ac.activity_type AS activityType, ac. STATUS, ac.user_id AS userId, ac.activity_start_time AS activityStartTime, ac.activity_end_time AS activityEndTime, ac.remark, ac.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, ac.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, IFNULL(ad.username,'默认管理员') as 'adminDTO.username' from kxmall_activity ac left join kxmall_admin ad on ad.id = ac.user_id where 1=1
AND ac.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND ac.activity_type = #{activityType}
AND ac.status = #{status}
AND unix_timestamp(ac.activity_start_time) < activityStartTime
AND unix_timestamp(ac.activity_end_time) > activityEndTime
order by ac.id desc

select ac.id, ac.title, ac.activity_type AS activityType, ac. STATUS, ac.user_id AS userId, ac.activity_start_time AS activityStartTime, ac.activity_end_time AS activityEndTime, ac.remark, ac.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, ac.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate from kxmall_activity ac where ac.id = #{id}

select ac.id, ac.title, ac.activity_type AS activityType, ac. STATUS, ac.user_id AS userId, ac.activity_start_time AS activityStartTime, ac.activity_end_time AS activityEndTime, ac.remark, ac.pull_new as 'pullNew', ac.pull_num as 'pullNum', ac.qualify_old as 'qualifyOld', ac.qualify_new as 'qualifyNew', ac.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, ac.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, ac.url AS url, acco.coupon_id as 'list.couponId' from kxmall_activity ac LEFT JOIN kxmall_activity_coupon acco on acco.activity_id = ac.id where ac.activity_type = #{type} and ac.status = 1
